Summary: Orange glowing oval/star like figure hovering moving directions while air plane following behind
divs: sighting detailsi went outside for a smoke at about 9:30pm and gazed at the stars & planes that pass through. i saw an orange glowing round disk\oval shape figure hovering and going left and right through the sky as if gravity and physics had no affect on it. there was also a plane headed in the same direction not far from the object. i don't know if it was following it or just headed in the same direction.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Haughton
There were no other sightings in Haughton on or around July 3rd 2013
